commit message: Add ) as sentence end marker to cap word after :-)

IME: Improve left-delete

E.g. 'token.|' is now deleted using two swipes ('token|', '|'), not a single swipe as before.

But the 1st swipe for 'token.  |' gives 'token|', not 'token.|' as before, which might
be unwanted.
IME: optionally apply regexes to transcription

Change support library v7 -> v13

This avoids certain dependencies that lint complained about.
Add Codacy Badge + some cleanup + add rewrites
Add CONTRIBUTING with some content from README
Improve code quality, based on Codacy feedback

Add dependency on speechutils

+ move some general code there
Rewrite some hardcoded values to use dimens

Use net-speech-api as Android library

This makes installation simpler.

Merge pull request #41 from Kaljurand/net-speech-api-as-android-library
